Class ConnectionManager

Provides connection management with support for read replicas and failover.

Dispose()

Disposes the manager and all pooled connections, terminating background tasks and releasing unmanaged resources.

Declaration
public void Dispose()
| Edit this page View Source

GetReadConnectionAsync(CancellationToken)

Retrieves an open connection optimized for read operations, using available read replicas and falling back to the primary node when necessary.

Declaration
public Task<DbConnection> GetReadConnectionAsync(CancellationToken ct = default)
Parameters
Type Name Description
CancellationToken ct

Token used to cancel the asynchronous operation.
Returns
Type Description
Task<DbConnection>

An open DbConnection suitable for read operations.
| Edit this page View Source

GetWriteConnectionAsync(CancellationToken)

Retrieves an open connection to the primary node for write operations. Implements a simple circuit breaker and failover mechanism.

Declaration
public Task<DbConnection> GetWriteConnectionAsync(CancellationToken ct = default)
Parameters
Type Name Description
CancellationToken ct

Token used to cancel the asynchronous operation.
Returns
Type Description
Task<DbConnection>

An open DbConnection suitable for write operations.
Exceptions
Type Condition
InvalidOperationException

Thrown when no primary node is available.
